amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available in this Act may be used to revise any policy or directive relating to hiring preferences for veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in House Report 114-639 to specify that no funds may be used to revise any policy or directive related to hiring preferences for veterans of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 409 - 14 (Roll no. 395).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 409 - 14 (Roll no. 395).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Gallego.
